chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Dragon Reborn
chapters.info: Guaire Amalasan, p. 127 (112)—False Dragon who commanded a large army during the time period from Free Years 939–943. He was able to channel the One Power with great strength. During his campaigns, he laid siege to the Stone of Tear in hopes of taking Callandor, and tried to take Tar Valon as well. Unfortunately for him, another young king came to power during his life, a young man named Artur Paendrag Tanreall, later known as Artur Hawkwing. Hawkwing put an end to Amalasan's conquest of the world, and conquered it for himself. Note that Amalasan's name was misspelled as Amalasin when he first appears in this book. See also Dragon Reborn.
